function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Excess mortality of immigrants due to COVID-19","Impact":"Disproportionate impact of the pandemic on immigrants, particularly those from low-income countries","Mitigation":"Improved access to healthcare, targeted public health interventions, and tailored health communications","Technologies":"Healthcare technology, data analysis tools for targeted interventions","People":"Immigrants, particularly those from low-income countries","Owner":"Healthcare systems, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Higher excess mortality linked to socio-demographic characteristics","Impact":"Increased risk of excess mortality for individuals with lower educational attainment and from low-income countries","Mitigation":"Social support programs, educational initiatives, and targeted healthcare interventions","Technologies":"Data analysis tools for identifying at-risk populations, educational technologies for outreach","People":"Individuals with lower educational attainment, immigrants from low-income countries","Owner":"Government agencies, educational institutions"},{"Description":"Communication barriers contributing to excess mortality","Impact":"Limited understanding of health communications and healthcare systems leading to higher mortality","Mitigation":"Language support services, culturally sensitive health education, and community outreach programs","Technologies":"Translation services, telemedicine platforms, digital health communication tools","People":"Immigrants, particularly those with language barriers","Owner":"Healthcare providers, community organizations"}]}
